pullrequest.title: Add color to edges in model editor schematic view

content.raw:

[JointMaker function coverage: 13.3%](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/240/clover-report/_var_lib_jenkins_workspace_gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64_gazebo_gazebo_gui_model/JointMaker_cc.html) I think the test is not running on Jenkins, right? Do we need all [these](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/f491436008ccd5e7172abb695c7e2a1e5ce6bf50/gazebo/gui/model/CMakeLists.txt#cl-48) tests to be inside `ENABLE_SCREEN_TESTS`?
content.html:
SchematicViewWidget function coverage: 78.6%

JointMaker function coverage: 13.3% I think the test is not running on Jenkins, right? Do we need all these tests to be inside ENABLE_SCREEN_TESTS?
